std::vector< Subsequence > StreamMonitor::feedStream ( data_t *  data,
tick_t  len 
)

Returns the events found in the supplied stream of data.

Parameters:
dataThe array of data describing the stream
lenThe number of samples in the stream; note that for a stream of k dimensions, this means that the array supplied must be of length k*len
Returns:
The collection of non-overlapping matching subsequences ("events"), in chronological order, discovered in the stream.

References Subsequence::isValid(), and processSample().
